guest.name: Pete Kazanjy
guest.title: Founder & CEO, Atrium
guest.background: Pete is the founder of Atrium, a data-driven sales management platform, and Modern Sales Pros, the world's largest community for sales operations. A product manager turned sales leader, he authored 'Founding Sales,' the definitive guide on B2B sales for founders.
guest.background_zh: Pete 是数据驱动型销售管理平台 Atrium 的创始人，也是全球最大的销售运营社区 Modern Sales Pros 的发起人。作为一名从产品经理成功转型的销售领袖，他撰写了《Founding Sales》一书，被誉为 B2B 创始人必读的销售指南。

episodeSummary: Pete Kazanjy joins Lenny to demystify B2B sales for founders and product managers, explaining why founders must lead early sales efforts before hiring. He details the transition from 'founder-led sales' to hiring the first sales representative using a 'product engineering' mindset. The conversation covers defining Ideal Customer Profiles (ICP), using leading indicators to manage sales performance, and the critical mistakes to avoid when scaling a sales team.
episodeSummary_zh: Pete Kazanjy 与 Lenny 深入探讨了创始人与产品经理如何打破对 B2B 销售的迷思，并强调了创始人必须在招聘前亲自跑通早期销售闭环的重要性。他用“产品工程”的思维详述了从“创始人主导销售”到招聘首位销售代表的转型过程。对话涵盖了定义理想客户画像（ICP）、利用前置指标管理销售绩效，以及在扩张销售团队时应避免的关键误区。
